name: MatchMania
description:
MatchMania

MatchMania is a puzzle game were you Match 4+ tiles of the same color.  New colors and power-ups are introduced as you go.  It is game over when your tiles reach the top 2 rows of the board.

How to Play - Keyboard

  • Arrows to Move
  • Up to Swap
  • Space to Drop

How to Play - Gamepad (Xbox 360)

  • Left Thumbstick (or DPad) to Move
  • B to Swap
  • A to Drop

Game Modes

The game has 3 different ways to play;

  • Marathon is the core of the game, 10 levels of difficulty, 7 colors and power-ups.
  • Sprint sees how fast you can clear 100 tiles.
  • Time Trial is all the fun of Marathon but in 3 minutes.

All Highscores are saved locally with the username you specify on the Options screen.

Scoring

  •  A match of 4 tiles will score 10 points on level 1
  •  A match with more than 4 tiles will double in value for each extra tile;
  •  A match of 5 is 20pts, 6 is 40pts, 7 is 80pts etc.
  •  Get a match of 7+ tiles to score a supermatch
  •  Get a match of 9+ tiles to score a hypermatch
  •  Get a match of 11+ tiles to score an ultramatch

Powerups

  • Multiplier - each multiplier in a match doubles the match value
  • Destroy row - destroys all tiles along that row
  • Destroy column - destroys all tiles along that column
  • Destroy random - destroys tiles at random across the board
  • Destroy colors - destroys all tiles of that color

Replays

You can save a Replay of your current game by pressing BackSpace (Keyboard) or Back (GamePad) at any time. Pressing this saves the entire Replay of your session, not just from when you pressed it.

Thanks for playing!
